rows.jenkinsConfig:
{"sonarExcuteStep":0,"trigger_poll":"0","trigger_push":"0","buildSteps":"excuteShell_step","trigger_merge":"0","executeShell":"rm -rf $WORKSPACE/nginx-fep/
git clone http://jenknis:11111111@192.168.11.190/cheryfs/nginx-fep.git
cd  $WORKSPACE/nginx-fep/
git checkout  pre
cd $WORKSPACE/nginx-fep/AITeller-ng/
cp -r  /root/nginx_shell/node_modules  ./
chmod  -R 777 $WORKSPACE/nginx-fep/AITeller-ng/node_modules
/root/node-v9.0.0-linux-x64/bin/node --max_old_space_size=16384 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --prod --output-hashing=all
chmod  -R  775   $WORKSPACE/nginx-fep/AITeller-ng/dist
cd $WORKSPACE/
if [ ! -d  nginx_conf ];
then
   mkdir  nginx_conf
fi
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/nginx_conf/*
cd  nginx_conf
git clone http://jenknis:11111111@192.168.11.190/cheryfs_conf/nginx.git","poll_scheduled_unit":"m","analysisProperties":"
","rootPom":"pom.xml","buildStyle":"freedom"}
rows.dockerfile:
FROM   abcsys.cn:5000/public/nginx-sp:v1
RUN mkdir -p /etc/nginx/logs/
ADD ./nginx-fep/AITeller-ng/dist /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist
ADD    ./nginx_conf/nginx/sit/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/
ADD ./nginx_conf/nginx/sit/cheryConfig.js /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist/assets/config/
RUN chmod 775 /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist/assets/config/cheryConfig.js

FROM   abcsys.cn:5000/public/nginx-sp:v1
RUN mkdir -p /etc/nginx/logs/
ADD ./nginx/AITeller-ng/dist /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist

FROM abcsys.cn:5000/public/centos-jdk:v5
RUN echo '122.112.233.248   openapi.bestsign.info' >> /etc/hosts
ADD ./ccm/base-bosent-credit/credit/target/credit-161102-08-dev-executable.jar /opt/
ADD ./ccm_conf/ccm/sit  /opt/
ADD  ./ccm_conf/ccm/start_shell/simsun.ttf  /usr/local/java/jdk/jre/lib/fonts/simsun.ttf
ADD ./ccm_conf/ccm/start_shell/ccm_sit.sh      /opt/sh/
ENV LC_ALL zh_CN.UTF-8
ENV LANG zh_CN.UTF-8
WORKDIR /opt/sh/
CMD ./ccm_sit.sh

mv  cip_conf/cip/sit/config   ./

rows.dockerfile:
FROM abcsys.cn:5000/public/cps:v1
ENV  JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/openjdk-8
RUN  export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin
RUN  rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/bin/bof-config.xml
RUN  rm  -rf  /usr/local/tomcat/bof-config.xml
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/sit/bof-config.xml  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/sit/bof-config.xml  /usr/local/tomcat/
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/sit/runtimelib  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/datavalidation/catalina.sh  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
RUN chmod +x  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/catalina.sh
RUN  rm -rf  /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/etlplus.war
ADD  ./cps/cpsMain/etlplus/target/etlplus.war   /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/etlplus.war
ADD  ./cps/cpsMain/scheduler/target/scheduler.war  /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/scheduler.war
RUN  cp  -r  /usr/local/tomcat/bioffice.properties   /
RUN  cp  -r  /usr/local/tomcat/bioffice.properties  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
WORKDIR /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
CMD ./catalina.sh run
